description: Every run of digits of n in base 3 has length 2.
comments: See A043291 for the base 2 version (which has a very simple formula), A033002 - A033014 for bases 4 through 16, A033015 - A033029 for the variants with runs of length >= 2. - _M. F. Hasler_, Feb 01 2014
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..250
author: _Clark Kimberling_
